level.heading: WHERE CARE MAY BE PROVIDED (ยง 29-917)

level.text: Nurse-midwifery services shall be provided as follows:
In a hospital on an inpatient or outpatient basis;
In a free-standing treatment and diagnostic clinic or free-standing maternity center;
In the office of the nurse-midwife or the physician providing collaboration and referral services; or
In the recipient’s home or alternative residence.
Each facility in which labor and delivery services are provided shall be licensed in accordance with District of Columbia law.
